title: Re: Merry X-Mas!
content:
heh heh.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Santa can be killed by silver bullet, kryptonite, a stake through the heart, bee sting, Sonic Boom!, and a bite from the Easter Bunny. However, all of these things must happen at the exact same time.
If you are unable to manipulate a situation to this effect, find the biggest gun you can and keep firing until he runs off. [hr][/quote]

Is that what the picture is refering to?
I can see the rabbit and such, but where is the bee etc?

[quote]Quote:[hr]I'll be back when you are least expecting it - next christmas.[hr][/quote]

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]

[img]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b33/freeyorp101/sig2.png[/img]

[hr]

The yorp shalt inherit the mars

title: Re: Merry X-Mas!
content: Ho ho ho. Uncyclopedia is definitely worth a look at if you have some free time (but keep well clear if you don't - before you know it you'll have been clicking around it for hours)

title: Re: Merry X-Mas!
content:
Yes! Merry Keenmas to all!

This year the snow shall run red with the blood of innocents! Bring me the sacrificial turkey!

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"Is that what the picture is refering to?"
Nope. I found the picture accidentally from entirely different page, not related to the article.

Now when I finally decided to get up from bed, here's the list of what is going to happen the next:
* church [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-christmas.gif[/img]

content:

title: Re: Merry X-Mas!
content:
Today I blasted Van Halen, did a quick run to the gym and some last minute shopping at the mall.

Tonight I'll be watching A Christmas Carol and going to church.

Tomorrow I'll wake up and blast Dream Theater's "6:00," open some presents, and then go to a halfway house and serve Christmas dinner.

All in all, not a bad Christmas.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Toothy glare.
content:
I've been doped up on paracetamol trying to kill yet another toothache. Whose brilliant idea was it to install nerves in teeth!? Brandy is on its way later, though, so hopefully I'll have a less painful Boxing Day.

All I want for Christmas is to have all my teeth ripped out by a professional. Alas, the nearest dentist that will carry out a general anesthetic is 300km away [they stopped doing it down here a couple of months ago, two weeks before I rocked up there] and Tuesday's probably the earliest I can get in touch to make an appointment.

Oh, well... hopefully this nerve will die soon like all the others. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

content:

title: Re: Hm
content:
No, I have used a guitar before... but I can only play a handful of songs... and not even those are that good. My mom thought it was time to give me a challenge. I am either <b>sitting</b> in front of a PC, or <b>sitting</b> in front of a keyboard. Mom wants me to stand up, and do something challenging: I conpose piano in my sleep; this should be a fun challege.

THe make? Idk... it's a black electric guitar... that's all I know riht now; don't have it with me.Tough Guys Can Fix Their Own Problems!!!
